bs-matomoconnector-pref-siteid: Label for the Matomo site ID configuration option.
bs-matomoconnector-pref-siteid-help: Help message for the Matomo site ID configuration option. Indicates how to find the site ID in Matomo.
bs-matomoconnector-pref-baseurl: Label for the Matomo base URL configuration option.
bs-matomoconnector-pref-baseurl-help: Help message for the Matomo base URL configuration option. Explains the expected format without site ID.
bs-matomoconnector-pref-authtoken: Label for the Matomo authentication token configuration option.
bs-matomoconnector-pref-authtoken-help: Help message for the Matomo authentication token configuration option. Explains where to find the token in Matomo.
bs-matomoconnector-pref-optoutfooter: Label for the option to display a Matomo opt-out link in the wiki footer.
bs-matomoconnector-pref-optoutfooter-hel: Help message for the option to display a Matomo opt-out link in the footer. Explains that the link opens the analysis service page with an opt-out checkbox.
bs-matomoconnector-special-optoutheading: Heading text for [[Special:OptOut]], the Matomo opt-out special page.
bs-matomoconnector-special-privacynote: HTML content for [[Special:OptOut]], explaining Matomo's data collection, cookie usage, and opt-out mechanism.
bs-matomoconnector-optout-footerlink: Text for the footer link to [[Special:OptOut]].
bs-matomoconnector-privacy-cookie-group: Label for the Matomo cookie group in BlueSpicePrivacy consent manager.
bs-matomoconnector-privacy-cookie-group-: Description text for the Matomo cookie group in BlueSpicePrivacy consent manager. Explains what cookies Matomo sets and how data is processed.
